name: Wargame:West Front
description: A real time strategy game based on historical campaign fought on west Europe during 1944-1945, with vast unit selection from infantry, tanks to planes. Campaigns from both Allied and Axis PoV available where player can fight their way from the bloody beach of Normandy to the secret weapon facilities deep in German heartland, taking control of over 150 units including not only the iconic Tiger tank, P-47 Thunderbolt, but also exciting experimental WWII weapons such as Go-229 jet fighter, or the T95 super heavy tank.
